remarks: Lemma for theorems about direct product projection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
dpjlem $p |- ( ph -> ( G DProd ( S |` { X } ) ) = ( S ` X ) ) $.
